thread.title: What to Know About ‘529’ Transfers

author: Chana R. Schoenberger
title: What to Know About ‘529’ Transfers
text:
We again asked experts to consider questions from readers about college savings, in particular the tax-advantaged “529” savings accounts that invest in mutual funds and are used to pay for higher education.
*** What are the transfer rules for 529s?
The beneficiary of a 529 can be switched to any direct relative of the original beneficiary...
